creator: 0x8c8d9f1c12356a0107278ddedf5ee9e51bf564a3
name: CityMonk
description:
The CityMonk is to create a decentralized urban religion and an ecosystem for the creative people. We imagine a future where we are connected to blockchain networks, freely switching from one to another network and conduct all our daily activities.
Mission
The CityMonk urban culture consists of Street movement that can be Governed by the CityMonk token holders, who will be known as Citymonks.
As part of the CityMonk project we are looking to build our blockchain and launch a native token C¥ (cyber yen) for ecosystem feeding.
In ideas, take the basis of Substrate with EVM pallet to run Solidity smart contracts and use existing developer tools. Also adding zk-proof mechanism.
We created our temporary CIMO Governance Token on the Polygon Network to drive the development of the blockchain network within the DAO through voting.
Join us as volunteers, developers, investors. Each contributor will be rewarded with CIMO.
https://polygonscan.com/token/0xd92fBED627af1C9Ac28ac92B9A802C83B32331a7
payDisclosure: Thanks for support. Stay with us to become a part of C¥.
